channel.title: Mtw2?
channel.description:
Well anyone wanna share their experiences with this game? (medieval total war 2)
I can buy it for $15.00 so it's pretty cheep comparing @ target [$30] and bestbuy [$20]
Anyways is it worth it? Are the campaign modes fun?
thanks

item.title: Mtw2?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:2, topic:303268”]Or you could just torrent it for free…
and if you have issues with piracy, buy the game after if you like it.[/quote]

I’m not worried about pirating, it’s just I can’t be assed to wait that long and I’m just flat out shit at torrenting. I tried torrenting starwars: EWA and it said it’d take 32days and 18hrs. And I’m not going to overheat my whole system and end up paying 5 times the cost of the game on my electricity. And sure, I can turn of my pc and shit but then it’d take 3 times the length to dl it. I also spend a well amount of time on my pc [4hrs a day] and if it’s downloading while I play games it’ll lag me like a bitch. There is also the risks of viruses which I relatively get a lot.
So fuck torrenting

There is my brief explanation of a few of many reasons why I hate to torrent so please, don’t post

“Just fucking torrent idiot, save your money”

Read full topic
